    Method

    void
    GraphicUI.changeDiceImage​(Pawn p, Dice dice)
    Transformer: Changes the dice image for one of the players
    Precondition: The pawn and the dice must not be null
    Postcondition: Image has been changed
    int
    GraphicUI.cryptoPopUp​(Dice dice)
    The player selects if he wants to bid 300$ on a cryptocoin, 1 if the price increased, if it dropped 2 is returned and if he didn't bid or the price remained the same 0 is returned
    Player
    GraphicUI.lotteryPopUp​(Player p1, Player p2, Dice dice)
    Called when a player arrives at a lottery tile.
    Player
    GraphicUI.radioPopUp​(Player p1, Player p2, Dice dice)
    Called when a player arrives at a radio tile.
    int
    GraphicUI.sundayPopUp​(Dice dice)
    The player selects a team that he wants to bid on 500$, if his guess was correct 1 is returned, if it was wrong 2 is returned and if he didn't bid 0 is returned
